enable_nextcloud: Use a virtual host for Nextcloud
warning_text: Nextcloud will be accessible only using a dedicated host name (eg. nextcloud.yourdomain.org). If you're using a Let's Encrypt certificate, remember to add the host name below to the "Domains" field inside the "Server certificate" page
valid_fqdn: Must contain at least two dots, like 'myhost.example.com'
valid_trusted_domains: Each element must contain at least two dots, like 'myhost.example.com'
warning-password: The default password for the admin user is 'Nethesis,1234'. Please change it as soon as possible to avoid security issues!
warning_wellknown: This option will override the discovery URL used by clients to auto-configure contacts and calendars synchronization. Leave this option unchecked if you already have installed a groupware such as WebTop or SOGo
default_trusted_domains: If virtual host is disabled, Nextcloud is always accessible from all server IPs and FQDNs
